channel.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
channel.description:
How would you edit the client so it looks like this? Where would u begin?
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img546/7341/runescapeclassic2.png[/img]

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:58, topic:512848”][quote author=marc110 link=topic=631093.msg4278590#msg4278590 date=1365251622]

If you have to ask, you obviously don’t have the knowledge to do it.

your right, just was thinking maybe if we make classic more like rs2 people would start playing again though… dunno i just was wondering… thanks anyways. i know the world map would have to be loaded into the map…

add
all option (e.g cook all )
auto fishing like in rs2 , keep clicking gives you carpel tunnel
same as fishing for woodcutting
move faster moving around in rsc is slow and dull
add all dragon items

automated actions are stupid, how on earth could waiting improve gameplay in anyway.

they were added to stop RSI and carpel tunnel , its better not to keep clicking all the time , as the other has said if you make the game more like rs2 they will play

jagex should of updated classic with all the things above
[/quote]No, Jagex should have updated classic with RS2, which they did.[/quote]

Then the whole project is a waste of time.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a classic client that looks like rs2

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

This might take some time getting used to… but definitely a great idea for bridging ‘the gap.’

Read full topic
item.source: Making a classic client that looks like rs2

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @killergrunt2 killergrunt2
item.description:
@killergrunt2 wrote:

imthenull:

yeah, I did do some minor work. I updated the size of the client (make the camera size only 512x334), while making the frame size 700x500 (or something like that, w/e rs2 is). decided to work on some other stuff though

i know this is a bump and im sorry, you might not even be here anymore, but i wanted ask about the client width and such from camera.java. im trying to make rsc be 1024x768. im using easyrsc source for a server and im using openrscd as a client. do you (or anyone else for that matter!) have any tips?

Read full topic
item.source: Making a classic client that looks like rs2

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:4, topic:512848”]It wouldn’t be that hard, but I don’t see the point…[/quote]^ this

I mean why in the hell would you want to do that? Rs2 graphics are bad as it is already but good lord. ( no offence you RSC freaks I <3 all of you )

Read full topic

If you have to ask, you obviously don’t have the knowledge to do it.

your right, just was thinking maybe if we make classic more like rs2 people would start playing again though… dunno i just was wondering… thanks anyways. i know the world map would have to be loaded into the map…

add
all option (e.g cook all )
auto fishing like in rs2 , keep clicking gives you carpel tunnel
same as fishing for woodcutting
move faster moving around in rsc is slow and dull
add all dragon items

automated actions are stupid, how on earth could waiting improve gameplay in anyway.
[/quote]

they were added to stop RSI and carpel tunnel , its better not to keep clicking all the time , as the other has said if you make the game more like rs2 they will play

jagex should of updated classic with all the things above[/quote]No, Jagex should have updated classic with RS2, which they did.

your right, just was thinking maybe if we make classic more like rs2 people would start playing again though… dunno i just was wondering… thanks anyways. i know the world map would have to be loaded into the map…

add
all option (e.g cook all )
auto fishing like in rs2 , keep clicking gives you carpel tunnel
same as fishing for woodcutting
move faster moving around in rsc is slow and dull

[/quote]

item.source: Making a classic client that looks like rs2

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“xrune, post:55, topic:512848”][quote author=marc110 link=topic=631093.msg4277816#msg4277816 date=1365160801]
don’t worry about the client , if you want people from rs2 to play classic add stuff like rs2 into rsc
[/quote]

Many players from rs2 “like” runescape classic… but since its no longer updated they arent playing it plus only members and if had a runescape veteran account can play it…
If you make the game more familiar to them they will feel more comfortable playing it… and i really do think that it would pick up players if we made this client… and had some of the things rs2 has… with some updates players would feel like rsc would be making progress…[/quote]I’m pretty sure none of these ideas have any basis.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a classic client that looks like rs2

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

marc110:

don’t worry about the client , if you want people from rs2 to play classic add stuff like rs2 into rsc

Many players from rs2 “like” runescape classic… but since its no longer updated they arent playing it plus only members and if had a runescape veteran account can play it…
If you make the game more familiar to them they will feel more comfortable playing it… and i really do think that it would pick up players if we made this client… and had some of the things rs2 has… with some updates players would feel like rsc would be making progress… Never know thats why we gotta try out new things to see what works…

Read full topic

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @Dylan4755 Dylan4755
item.description:
@Dylan4755 wrote:

[quote=“marc110, post:52, topic:512848”][quote author=xrune link=topic=631093.msg4273967#msg4273967 date=1364783672]

If you have to ask, you obviously don’t have the knowledge to do it.

your right, just was thinking maybe if we make classic more like rs2 people would start playing again though… dunno i just was wondering… thanks anyways. i know the world map would have to be loaded into the map…
[/quote]

don’t worry about the client , if you want people from rs2 to play classic add stuff like rs2 into rsc

add
all option (e.g cook all )
auto fishing like in rs2 , keep clicking gives you carpel tunnel
same as fishing for woodcutting
move faster moving around in rsc is slow and dull
add all dragon items

this is how you would get rs2 players into rsc

most of the above is why they made rs2 in the first place[/quote]
That be cool with the client as well

your right, just was thinking maybe if we make classic more like rs2 people would start playing again though… dunno i just was wondering… thanks anyways. i know the world map would have to be loaded into the map…[/quote]

don’t worry about the client , if you want people from rs2 to play classic add stuff like rs2 into rsc

add
all option (e.g cook all )
auto fishing like in rs2 , keep clicking gives you carpel tunnel
same as fishing for woodcutting

this is how you would get rs2 players into rsc

most of the above is why they made rs2 in the first place

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:44, topic:512848”]take a look at this
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/54200156/eggsampler-rsc-204-d223fc6b77db.zip
i don’t think it’s compatible with rscd though[/quote]Thanks, I have that on my laptop already and have reused some of the naming. But yeah, the only issue is I’m pretty sure it won’t work for rscd (though some minor edits could change that). I’ll just stick with RSCDEF for now.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a classic client that looks like rs2

item.title: Making a classic client that looks like rs2
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:40, topic:512848”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=631093.msg4276907#msg4276907 date=1365049036]

[quote author=imthenull link=topic=631093.msg4276896#msg4276896 date=1365046783]
idk im skeptical about using either one now, i should just start fresh client.
[/quote]This. Also, if you do that we can look at the diffs to see what you did.
[/quote]Do you know of any clean clients that will also work with RSCD (for testing purposes)?[/quote]
mm isn’t the mopar 202 client about the cleanest client around?

Not sure if I’ve seen any which are any better.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:42, topic:512848”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=631093.msg4276908#msg4276908 date=1365049210]

idk im skeptical about using either one now, i should just start fresh client.
[/quote]This. Also, if you do that we can look at the diffs to see what you did.
[/quote]Do you know of any clean clients that will also work with RSCD (for testing purposes)?
[/quote]What about https://github.com/xetr0v/mpc-client[/quote]Although I like that client, I would rather quickly refactor one myself. I’ve downloaded RSCDEF and have begun refactoring that client, it has minor edits and is clean.
